name: RTCError
description: The RTCError interface describes an error which has occurred while handling WebRTC operations. It's based upon the standard DOMException interface that describes general DOM errors.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCError' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
